ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:0.5_0: 10. The training rule on dancing and singing
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.2_0: On one occasion in Rājagaha there was a hilltop fair,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.3_0: and the nuns from the group of six went to see it.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.4_0: People then complained and criticized those nuns,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.5_0: “How can nuns go to see dancing, singing, and music? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.6_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.7_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.8_0: “How can the nuns from the group of six go to see dancing, singing, and music?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.9_0: “Is it true, monks, that those nuns did that?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.12_0: “How can the nuns from the group of six go to see dancing, singing, and music?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.13_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.14_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:1.15.1_0: ‘If a nun goes to see dancing or singing or music, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.1.11_0: If she is on her way to visit them, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.1.12_0: Wherever she stands to see it or hears it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.1.13_0: Every time she moves outside the range of sight and then sees it again, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.1.14_0: If she is on her way to visit any one of them, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.1.15_0: Wherever she stands to see it or hears it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.1.16_0: Every time she moves outside the range of sight and then sees it again, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.2_0: if she sees it or hears it while remaining in the monastery;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.3_0: if the army comes to where the nun is standing, sitting, or lying down;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.4_0: if she sees it while remaining;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.5_0: if she goes there because there is something to be done and she then sees it or hears it;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.6_0: They burn in times of trouble,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.8_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.9_0: The tenth rule, the training rule on tenth rule, is finished.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc10:2.2.10_0: The first sub-chapter on garlic is finished.
